messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Down with the bar it serves vile drinks I saw them spit in the drinks once

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Oi! I be yer fucken captain, ya know Robbie? Our AI? Lynch focker!!!!!!!!! He's gone facken rouge!!!!!!!!!!!

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Bridge.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.
